tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: This review is after more than a month to see if my fillings would be intact and painless. Dr Ritesh would advise you all possible solutions to curb the disease or the ongoing issues. Yes the prices would be bit higher but then its worth spending. The complete process would be painless and he is a real friend to help you out in all consequences. His revert time is within minutes until n unless engaged in some other schedules. His professionalism is highly recommendable. No point in spending less somewhere else and getting more issues or incomplete solution. Dr Ritesh would be the right choice for you.
